item.title: dreamfactory常见问题汇总
item.description: Composer Install 依赖问题 报错缺少ext-mongodb依赖 root@iZ283foxixfZ:/var/www/df2# composer install --no-dev Running composer as root/super user is highly discouraged as packages, plugins and scripts cannot always be trusted Loading composer repositories with package information Installing dependencies from lock file Your requirements could not be resolved to an installable set of packages. Problem 1 -
